# Ancient Races

* [[Allmer]] - every creature in the world, originated from the Allmer, a group of Elder Spirits who became tired of the wars of the Eldrada and settled in the created world of Nirn. But the atrocity of Fygnell cased
* [[Hmner]] – Ancient Masters of Magic. With their advance knowledge of Magic, they combined it with technology, allowing them to become extremely powerful. In the process, they cast their faith for the gods away and rather worshipped logic and reason. This in turn inquired the Wrath of Sipilus, the God of Magic who brought the Great Cataclysm, wiping out many civilizations including the Hmners. Their mixed blood with the ancestors of the Gnomes, Olner, were the ancestors of the Modern Dwarves.
